item.title: Install MyBB on Ubuntu Server
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to install MyBB in Ubuntu Server. Requirements A Ubuntu Server virtual machine with: MySQL Apache FTP Samba Check out these posts to get ready: How to install Ubuntu Server on VirtualBox Setting up a Virtual Web Server with VirtualBox, Apache, MySQL, FTP, Ubuntu, and Samba Our virtual machine has two network adapters. The second one (eth1) is a host-only adapter with a static IP address -> 192.
